creator.name: Algemeene Zendingscommissie der Christelijk Gereformeerde Kerk (GKN)
creator.name_english: General Mission Committee of the Christian Reformed Church
creator.his_func: Among the small Christian Reformed churches, missionary work among the heathen and Mohammedans was held to be a task of the local churches. The missionary congregation of Kampen sent two missionaries to Suriname after the Emancipation of July 1863. Due to a lack of money, they had to return to the Netherlands in 1864.
creator.notes: See also the description in the "Repertorium van Nederlandse zendings- en missie-archieven 1800-1960".
creator.Aantekeningen:
Zelf

Repertorium Z + M

Jaquet, p. 380-381

HUA, toegang 73, inleiding, p. 13
